CustomWidgets.datePicker module¶

class DatePicker(parent=None)¶

Bases: PySide.QtGui.QWidget

PySide widget to select a date from a input box or from a calender that drops down on clicking a button

DatePicker extends QWidget. It contains a QDateEdit input box where date may be entered manually. It also contains a QCalenderWidget that drops down on clicking a QPushButton. Selecting a date from the drop-down QCalenderWidget will automatically update the date in QDateEdit input box.

Example:

d = DatePicker()    # creates a DatePicker object
date = d.getDate()   # returns the selected date
clear()¶
getDate()¶

Returns the selected date

Returns:The selected date
Return type:QDate
setDate(date)¶

Sets the given date in the DatePicker

Parameters:date (QDate) – this date is set in the DatePicker
Returns:None
setReadOnly(val=True)¶
